full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DREGS PA SPYI LA GLUD GTOR GTONG TSUL DREGS PA'I RE BA SKONG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @013A *, ,(CES DREGS PA SPYI LA GLUD GTOR GTONG TSUL DREGS PA'I RE BA SKONG ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG, SEMS CAN GYI DON BYED PA PO'I GANG ZAG LA GTZO PHAL GNYIS LAS, GTZO BO NI TSE 'DI'I SNANG SHAS KYI DBANG DU MA SONG BAR NGES 'BYUNG BYANG SEMS YANG DAG LTAB LA SOGS RGYUD LA LDAN ZHING, RANG NYID NUS PA GDENGS THOB PAS THABS GZHAN LA RE BA MED PAR 'GRO BA'I DON RLABS PO TSE GRUB PAR @013B MDZAD MOD KYANG, PHAL BA'ANG DE LTA BU'I YON TAN MI LDAN NA YANG 'GRO DON BYAS KYI KHUR BABS PA DAG GIS ZHING GI MTHU LA BRTEN NAS MKHAS GRUB DAM PA'I THABS MKHAS KYIS ZIN ZHING, SBYIN BDAG GI 'BYOR BA CHE CHUNG DANG DAL BREL GYI SKABS DANG BSTUN NAS JI LTAR 'TSAM PA ZHIG BYA DGOS LA, YID CHES PA'I GNAS TSAD LDAN MKHAS PA'I GSUNG LA BRTEN NAS KYANG 'GRO LA PHAN PAR BYED 'DOD PA RNAMS KYI THUGS BZHED BSKONG BA'I SLAD DANG, SNYIGS MA'I DUS KYI MTHAR SLEB PAS 'GRO RNAMS LAS KYIS MNAR ZHING GDON BGEGS KYI GNOD PA BOD PA'I DUS 'DIR 'GA' ZHIG LA PHAN PA'ANG SRID DAM SNYAM PAS, SPRUL SKU BSTAN GNYIS GLING BAR SLOB DPON CHEN PO PADMA K'A RAS ZHAL DNGOS @014A *, ,SU BSTAN NAS GNANG BA'I GLUD CHOG 'DI KHRUNGS BTZUN ZHING PHAN CHE BAR MTHONG NAS, GRUB DBANG CHOS KYI RDO RJES LHAN THABS SBYAR NAS LAG TU BLANG BDE BAR BKOD PA BZHIN DU, BLA MA DAM PA'I ZHABS RTUL SPYI BOS LEN PA'I ^NGAG DBANG CHOS 'PHEL GYIS BRIS PA 'DIS KYANG SKYE 'GRO LA PHAN PA RGYA CHEN 'GROB PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
